io.odysz.semantic.DA.drvmnger

Class SqliteDriver2

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.odysz.semantic.DA.AbsConnect<SqliteDriver2>
      • io.odysz.semantic.DA.drvmnger.SqliteDriver2

  • public class SqliteDriver2
extends AbsConnect<SqliteDriver2>
    All instance using the same connection.
    Sqlite connection.
    SqliteDriver using sigle connection to avoid error:
    see StackOverflow: Getting [SQLITE_BUSY] database file is locked with select statements
    Author:
    odys-z@github.com
